title: Sri Lanka’s External Ministry backs off on taking up issue of dropping of Pali for IAS exams with Government of India
content: – by Shenali D. Waduge – Sri Lanka is a Buddhist country whatever schemes are being attempted to overtly and covertly dilute and change this fact. We are well aware of these agendas.
